com.barchart.feed.ddf.datalink.api
Interface DDF_FeedClient

All Superinterfaces:
DDF_FeedClientBase
public interface DDF_FeedClient
extends DDF_FeedClientBase

Client responsible for lowest level connectivity to the data server.

Implementation should handle all communications from server asynchronously. Permits only nonblocking commands.

User is required to bind a StateListener to the client, creating a callback for login state changes for the client.

Method Summary
 void setPolicy(DDF_FeedEvent event, EventPolicy policy)
          Sets the event policy for a specific feed event.

Method Detail

setPolicy

void setPolicy(DDF_FeedEvent event,
               EventPolicy policy)
Sets the event policy for a specific feed event. Default policies are set by the constructor to handle disconnects and login success.

Specified by:
setPolicy in interface DDF_FeedClientBase
Parameters:
event - The feed event on which to enact the policy.
policy - The even policy to register.
